website_summaries.verdict: While it's neither a must-have upgrade for existing 360 owners nor as feature-packed as the PS3, the Xbox 360 Elite's combination of top-notch gaming and digital media features make it the current game console of choice.
pros: Excellent selection of games, including many 360-only exclusives
all games are in native high-definition
Xbox Live service offers online multiplayer (with matchmaking and voice chat) and content downloads for most games
backward compatible with many--but not all--original Xbox titles
doubles as a superior digital media hub and Windows Media extender
online Marketplace allows easy purchases of minigames, add-on gaming content, high-def movies, and TV shows
cons: The Elite fails to correct most of the annoyances of the original 360 version: the noisy DVD drive and cooling fan
online gaming requires a paid subscription to Xbox Live
proprietary wireless format limits third-party accessories

customer_reviews.title: First off, the disc reader doesn't work, It ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, the disc reader doesn't work, It won't even open unless I pry it. And I'm sure that will break soon. Every once on a while the on button flashes red and won't even let me turn the Xbox on for days... Idk what kind of scam you are trying to pull but this xbox is a complete piece of trash.. Can't believe you say this is tested and refurbished when a monkey could press a button to see if you can put a disc inside!!!

customer_reviews.title: Bad product distribution. Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: The first day, fresh out of the box and the tray wouldn't open. We went to put a game in for the first time and it was stuck. Either the seller neglected their responsibility of checking the product the sell or the knew and sold it to me anyway. Today it is screwing up again. If we could post the video of the disappointment and annoyance of the tray not opening we would. I even included a shot of the serial number. Absolute junk and this seller is not to be trusted. Absolutely one of my worst Amazon purchasing experiences. Utter disappointment

The XBOX itself works just fine.

customer_reviews.title: very well done
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far I played it for weeks and I kept it on all night for hours on end and still no red rings. Works great till it gets gets the red rings then I'll have to fix it. But other than that no errors it is beautiful. But one thing I noticed the power supply was making a rattling noise when the fans booted up it didn't make a rattling noise for about 10 to 15 minutes but then after a while it stopped and it worked fine so I'm assuming that it just needs lubrication I will rate 5 stars it works very well

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!!!! NOT FROM MICROSOFT!

I've seen many other reviews with the same issue which leads me to believe it is actually the same defective XBOX 360 being sold and insured by amazon. Do yourself a favor and steer clear of Amazon's False/misleading advertising as it is nothing but a cheap way to keep products being sold.

I wouldn't risk it unless you know how to work on these.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this console. Better than the PS3 by a long shot. Just don't like paying for Live but I'll deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: elite0356

customer_reviews.title: Ok but Controller was damaged
customer_reviews.text: The system is good. The control that came with it was damaged. We had to tape the part that holds the batteries. The battery holder was in three pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good, same as described
customer_reviews.text: I did not face any problems. Works good, same as described, quick delivery and i loved the waY IT WAS WRAPPED AND PACKED.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Good Seller
customer_reviews.text: yes all requirements were met. Price was very good. Like new. Now our household has two of them for use to play .
customer_reviews.author: chresoula  netschke

product_meta.title: Microsoft Xbox 360 Elite 120GB Console Bundle
product_meta.description: Xbox 360 Elite console: The console is equipped with a premium black finish and an HDMI port and like all Xbox 360 systems, comes with three powerful core processors, 16:9 cinematic aspect ratio, anti-aliasing for smooth textures, full surround sound, HDMI cable and DVD playback with upscaling capabilities right out of the box. Xbox 360 120GB hard drive: The huge 120GB detachable hard drive allows gamers to save their games and store television shows, movies, music, pictures, trailers, extra game levels, demos and other content available from Xbox LIVE Marketplace. Xbox 360 Wireless Controller (black): The sleek black finish of this high-performance wireless controller matches the style of the Elite Console. It has a range of up to 30 feet and a battery life of 30 hours on two AA batteries. Xbox 360 headset (black): Now available in black, the headset lets you strategize while playing together online or trade taunts with your opponents. You can also send voice messages to friends on Xbox LIVE. Xbox 360 HDMIcable: New to Xbox 360, HDMI lets you get HD video (up to 1080p) and multichannel surround sound, all from one cable. Xbox LIVE Silver Membership: With this, gamers can chat with friends online, collect achievements and gamerscores, send and receive voice and text messages, and access Xbox LIVE Marketplace content such as game demos, HD movies and TV, as well as the best in downloadable games from Xbox LIVE Arcade. One-month subscription to Xbox LIVE Gold: An Xbox LIVE Gold Membership provides a complete online entertainment experience. Subscribe to this premium service and engage in competitive online multiplayer matches, tailor your matchmaking via feedback and accomplishments, chat with more than one person at a time, and take advantage of unique privileges in Xbox LIVE Marketplace and Xbox LIVE Arcade.
